item.title: Creamy Sweet Potato Casserole with Crunchy Pecan Topping
item.description: This creamy sweet potato casserole is a must-try for your next family gathering! Packed with fresh sweet potatoes, brown sugar, and a touch of vanilla, itâ€™s a comforting side dish that pairs perfectly with any meal. Top it off with crunchy pecans for that extra texture. Save this recipe for later!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 4 medium sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed
  • 1/2 cup brown sugar, packed
  • 1/4 cup unsalted butter, melted (I use Kerrygold)
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg
  • 1/2 cup milk (I prefer Organic Valley)
  • 1 cup chopped pecans
  • 1/4 cup all-purpose flour

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  2. Boil the sweet potatoes in a large pot until tender, about 15 minutes. Drain and mash them in a bowl.
  3. Stir in the brown sugar, melted butter, vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg, and milk until smooth.
  4. Spread the sweet potato mixture into a greased baking dish.
  5. In a separate bowl, mix the chopped pecans with flour and sprinkle over the sweet potato layer.
  6. Bake for 30 minutes or until the topping is golden brown and crunchy.

item.title: Creamy Macaroni and Cheese That Everyone Will Love
item.description: Creamy macaroni and cheese ready in just 30 minutes! Loaded with rich cheese sauce and perfectly cooked pasta. Great for family dinners or cozy nights in. Try this recipe and make it a staple in your home!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 10 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 20 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 8 ounces elbow macaroni
  • 2 cups shredded sharp cheddar cheese
  • 1 cup milk (whole or 2% works best)
  • 2 tablespoons unsalted butter
  • 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour
  • 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1/2 teaspoon onion powder
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 1/4 cup breadcrumbs (optional for topping)

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Start by boiling a large pot of salted water. Add the elbow macaroni and cook according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
  2. In the same pot, melt the butter over medium heat. Once melted, whisk in the flour and cook for about 1 minute until bubbly.
  3. Gradually pour in the milk while whisking continuously to prevent lumps. Keep stirring until the mixture thickens, about 3-5 minutes.
  4. Add the shredded cheddar cheese, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper. Stir until the cheese melts and the sauce is smooth.
  5. Combine the cooked macaroni with the cheese sauce, mixing well to coat every piece. If you like a crispy topping, transfer to a baking dish, sprinkle breadcrumbs on top, and broil for 2-3 minutes until golden.
  6. Serve hot and enjoy your creamy macaroni and cheese!

item.title: Creamy Corn Casserole Recipe for Family Gatherings
item.description: This creamy corn casserole is a must-try for your next family gathering! With Jiffy mix, sweet creamed corn, and melty cheddar cheese, itâ€™s a dish everyone will love. Great for potlucks or holiday dinners. Save this recipe for effortless entertaining!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 10 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 45 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 box Jiffy corn muffin mix
  • 1 can (15 oz) creamed corn
  • 1 can (15 oz) whole kernel corn, drained
  • 1 cup sour cream
  • 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese
  • 1/4 cup melted butter
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1/2 teaspoon black pepper

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C). Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.
  2. In a large bowl, combine the Jiffy mix, creamed corn, whole kernel corn, sour cream, melted butter, salt, and pepper. Mix until well combined.
  3. Fold in half of the shredded cheddar cheese, saving the rest for topping.
  4. Pour the mixture into the prepared baking dish and spread it evenly.
  5. Sprinkle the remaining cheddar cheese on top.
  6. Bake for 45 minutes or until the casserole is golden and set in the center. Let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

item.title: Creamy Garlic Mashed Potatoes for Your Holiday Table
item.description: Creamy garlic mashed potatoes that are ready in just 30 minutes! Made with buttery Yukon gold potatoes and a hint of garlic, these are a must-have for your holiday table. Great for family gatherings or cozy dinners. Try this recipe for a comforting side dish!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 15 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 pounds Yukon gold potatoes, peeled and cubed
  • 1/2 cup heavy cream (or milk for a lighter option)
  • 1/4 cup unsalted butter, softened
  • 3 cloves garlic, minced
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Chives or parsley for garnish, optional

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Start by bringing a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the cubed Yukon gold potatoes and cook until fork-tender, about 15 minutes.
  2. While the potatoes are cooking, heat the heavy cream and butter in a small saucepan over low heat until warmed through. Add the minced garlic and let it infuse for a few minutes.
  3. Once the potatoes are done, drain them well and return them to the pot. Mash them using a potato masher or a ricer for a smoother texture.
  4. Pour the warm cream and garlic mixture over the mashed potatoes. Stir until well combined and creamy. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
  5. Transfer the mashed potatoes to a serving bowl and garnish with chopped chives or parsley if desired. Serve warm.

item.title: Easy Garlic Parmesan Cheeseburger Bombs (Under 1 Hour!)
item.description: Indulge in these easy garlic parmesan cheeseburger bombs, ready in just 43 minutes! Stuffed with seasoned beef, melty cheese, and a hint of garlic, they're perfect for parties or game days. Serve with marinara or ketchup for dipping. Pin this recipe for your next gathering! ğŸ”âœ¨
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 28 minutes

â° Total Time: 43 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 10

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 lb ground beef, cooked and seasoned
  • 1 can biscuit dough
  • Â½ cup shredded cheddar cheese
  • 1 tbsp garlic powder

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C).
  2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned, seasoning with salt and pepper to taste.
  3. Remove from heat and stir in the garlic powder and shredded cheddar cheese until well combined.
  4. Open the can of biscuit dough and separate it into individual biscuits.
  5. Flatten each biscuit into a circle and place a spoonful of the beef mixture in the center.
  6. Fold the edges of the biscuit over the filling and pinch to seal. Place seam-side down on a baking sheet.
  7. Bake in the preheated oven for 15-18 minutes, or until golden brown. Serve warm with marinara sauce or ketchup.

item.title: Easy Ruth's Chris Sweet Potato Casserole Recipe (45 Minutes!)
item.description: Indulge in this creamy, sweet potato casserole inspired by Ruth's Chris, ready in just 45 minutes! Made with rich sweet potatoes and topped with a crunchy pecan crust, it's perfect for holiday gatherings or family dinners. Save this crowd-pleaser for your next occasion! ğŸ
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 4 medium sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed
  • 1/2 cup brown sugar
  • 1/4 cup milk
  • 1/4 cup unsalted butter, melted
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg
  • 1 cup pecans, chopped
  • 1/2 cup mini marshmallows (optional)

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  2. In a large pot, boil the sweet potatoes until tender, about 15 minutes. Drain and mash them in a large bowl.
  3. Add brown sugar, milk, melted butter, vanilla extract, cinnamon, and nutmeg to the mashed sweet potatoes. Mix until smooth and well combined.
  4. Transfer the sweet potato mixture to a greased baking dish and spread it evenly.
  5. In a separate bowl, combine chopped pecans and mini marshmallows (if using). Sprinkle this mixture over the sweet potato layer.
  6. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the topping is golden brown and the casserole is heated through.

item.title: Perfect Sweet Potato Casserole with Pecan Crumble
item.description: Indulge in this creamy sweet potato casserole, perfectly spiced and topped with a crunchy pecan crumble! Made with simple ingredients, it's a delightful side for Thanksgiving or any family gathering. Save this recipe for a cozy holiday feast! ğŸ‚
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 45 minutes

â° Total Time: 60 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 8

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 4 cups sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed
  • 1/2 cup brown sugar
  • 1/4 cup milk
  • 1/4 cup unsalted butter, melted
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt
  • 1 cup mini marshmallows
  • 1 cup pecans, chopped
  • 1/2 cup flour
  • 1/4 cup granulated sugar

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  2. In a large pot, boil the sweet potatoes until tender, about 15-20 minutes. Drain and mash them in a large bowl.
  3. Add brown sugar, milk, melted butter, vanilla extract, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt to the mashed sweet potatoes. Mix until smooth and well combined.
  4. Transfer the sweet potato mixture to a greased 9x13 inch baking dish. Spread evenly.
  5. In a separate bowl, combine chopped pecans, flour, granulated sugar, and remaining melted butter. Mix until crumbly.
  6. Sprinkle the pecan mixture over the sweet potato layer, followed by a layer of mini marshmallows. Bake for 25-30 minutes, until the marshmallows are golden brown.

item.title: Homemade Classic Chili (Hearty Comfort Food)
item.description: Warm up with this easy homemade classic chili! Packed with rich flavors and hearty ingredients, it's perfect for cozy nights. A must-try recipe for chili lovers!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 45 minutes

â° Total Time: 60 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound ground beef, lean
  • 1 medium onion, diced
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 bell pepper, diced
  • 2 cans (15 oz each) kidney beans, drained and rinsed
  • 1 can (28 oz) crushed tomatoes
  • 2 tablespoons chili powder
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • 1 teaspoon paprika
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 1 cup beef broth
  • Optional toppings: shredded cheese, sour cream, chopped green onions

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a large pot over medium heat, brown the ground beef, breaking it apart with a spoon until fully cooked, about 5-7 minutes.
  2. Add the diced onion, garlic, and bell pepper to the pot. SautÃ© for 5 minutes, or until the vegetables are softened.
  3. Stir in the chili powder, cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper. Cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
  4. Add the crushed tomatoes, kidney beans, and beef broth. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer uncovered for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
  5. Taste and adjust seasoning if necessary. If you prefer a thicker chili, simmer for an additional 10-15 minutes.
  6. Serve hot, garnished with your choice of shredded cheese, sour cream, and green onions.

item.title: Homemade Creamy Mushroom Soup (Comforting Recipe)
item.description: Indulge in this creamy mushroom soup ready in just 30 minutes! Rich and savory, it's perfect for cozy nights. Try it tonight!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound fresh mushrooms, sliced
  • 1 medium onion, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon thyme, dried
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Fresh parsley for garnish

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a large pot, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and sautÃ© until translucent, about 5 minutes.
  2. Add the minced garlic and sliced mushrooms to the pot. Cook until the mushrooms are tender and golden brown, about 8-10 minutes.
  3. Pour in the vegetable broth and add the dried thyme. Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook for 10 minutes.
  4. Using an immersion blender, blend the soup until smooth. If you prefer a chunkier texture, blend only half of the soup.
  5. Stir in the heavy cream and season with salt and pepper to taste. Heat through for an additional 5 minutes.
  6. Serve hot, garnished with fresh parsley.

item.title: Ultimate Comfort Food Chili (Hearty Recipe)
item.description: Warm up with this hearty chili recipe, perfect for chilly nights! Packed with flavor and easy to make, it's a family favorite. Try it tonight!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 60 minutes

â° Total Time: 75 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 onion, diced
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 pound ground beef
  • 1 can (15 oz) kidney beans, drained and rinsed
  • 1 can (15 oz) black beans, drained and rinsed
  • 1 can (28 oz) crushed tomatoes
  • 2 tablespoons chili powder
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • 1 teaspoon smoked paprika
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 1 cup beef broth
  • 1 bell pepper, diced
  • 1 jalapeÃ±o, diced (optional)
  • Fresh cilantro for garnish

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a large pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the diced onion and sautÃ© for 3-4 minutes until translucent.
  2. Stir in the minced garlic and cook for an additional 1 minute until fragrant.
  3. Add the ground beef to the pot, breaking it up with a spoon. Cook until browned, about 5-7 minutes. Drain excess fat if necessary.
  4. Mix in the kidney beans, black beans, crushed tomatoes, chili powder, cumin, smoked paprika, salt, and pepper. Stir well to combine.
  5. Pour in the beef broth and add the diced bell pepper and jalapeÃ±o. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer uncovered for 30-40 minutes, stirring occasionally.
  6. Taste and adjust seasoning if necessary. Serve hot, garnished with fresh cilantro.

  • 1 teaspoon smoked paprika

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 60 minutes

â° Total Time: 75 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound ground beef, lean
  • 1 medium onion, diced
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 bell pepper, diced

  • 1 can (28 oz) crushed tomatoes
  • 2 tablespoons chili powder
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • 1 teaspoon smoked paprika
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 1 cup beef broth
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • Optional toppings: shredded cheese, sour cream, chopped green onions

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

item.title: Creamy Baked Mac and Cheese (Comfort Food Classic)
item.description: Indulge in creamy baked mac and cheese that's perfect for any occasion! This comforting dish is a crowd-pleaser, ideal for family gatherings. Try it tonight!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 8 ounces elbow macaroni, uncooked
  • 2 cups shredded sharp cheddar cheese
  • 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
  • 3 tablespoons butter
  • 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour
  • 2 cups milk
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1 teaspoon onion powder
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 1/2 cup breadcrumbs

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  2. Cook the elbow macaroni according to package instructions until al dente, then drain and set aside.
  3. In a large saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat. Stir in the flour and cook for about 1 minute until bubbly.
  4. Gradually whisk in the milk, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper. Cook until the mixture thickens and bubbles, about 5-7 minutes.
  5. Remove from heat and stir in the cheddar and mozzarella cheeses until melted and smooth.
  6. Combine the cooked macaroni with the cheese sauce, then pour into a greased baking dish. Top with breadcrumbs and bake for 20-25 minutes until golden and bubbly.

item.title: Hearty Lentil Stew & Creamy Mashed Potato Bowl - Comforting Vegetarian Family Meal
item.description: This Hearty Lentil Stew & Creamy Mashed Potato Bowl is the ultimate cozy meal. Packed with plant-based protein, it's perfect for cold nights and family dinners. Try this nourishing dish tonight!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 cup lentils, rinsed and drained
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • 1 onion, diced
  • 2 carrots, diced
  • 2 celery stalks, diced
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 teaspoon thyme
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 4 large potatoes, peeled and cubed
  • 4 tablespoons butter
  • 1/2 cup milk

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a large pot, sautÃ© onion, carrots, and celery in a bit of oil until softened.
  2. Add garlic, thyme, and cumin; cook for another minute.
  3. Stir in lentils and vegetable broth; bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20-25 minutes until lentils are tender.
  4. Meanwhile, boil potatoes in salted water until soft, about 15 minutes. Drain and mash with butter and milk until creamy.
  5. Season the stew with salt and pepper to taste, and serve over a generous scoop of mashed potatoes.

item.title: Comforting Meatloaf with Mashed Potatoes
item.description: Indulge in this hearty meatloaf with creamy mashed potatoes and cheese. It's the ultimate comfort food that brings warmth to your dinner table. Try this easy recipe for a cozy family meal tonight!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound ground beef
  • 1 cup breadcrumbs
  • 1/2 cup milk
  • 1/4 cup ketchup
  • 1 egg
  • 1 teaspoon salt
  • 1 teaspoon pepper
  • 2 cups mashed potatoes
  • 1 cup shredded cheese

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  2. In a large bowl, combine ground beef, breadcrumbs, milk, ketchup, egg, salt, and pepper. Mix until well combined.
  3. Shape the mixture into a loaf and place it in a baking dish.
  4. Bake for 30 minutes or until cooked through.
  5. While the meatloaf is baking, prepare the mashed potatoes according to your favorite recipe.
  6. Once the meatloaf is done, top it with shredded cheese and return to the oven for an additional 5 minutes until the cheese is melted.
  7. Serve the meatloaf with a generous helping of mashed potatoes.

item.title: Comforting Southern Green Bean Casserole for Thanksgiving Family
item.description: This Southern Green Bean Casserole is the ultimate comfort food for your Thanksgiving feast. With its creamy texture and savory flavors, it's sure to be a crowd-pleaser. Don't miss out on making this classic dish for your holiday gatherings!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 pounds fresh green beans, trimmed
  • 1 can cream of mushroom soup
  • 1 cup milk
  • 1 cup crispy fried onions
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  2. In a large pot, bring water to a boil and blanch the green beans for 5 minutes. Drain and set aside.
  3. In a mixing bowl, combine the cream of mushroom soup, milk, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
  4. Add the blanched green beans to the soup mixture and stir until well coated.
  5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and top with crispy fried onions.
  6. Bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes, or until bubbly and golden brown.

item.title: Creamy Vegetable Soup for Comforting Family Meals
item.description: Indulge in this creamy vegetable soup that warms your soul. Packed with fresh veggies and a rich cheesy base, it's the ultimate comfort food. Try this delightful recipe today!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 cups mixed vegetables (carrots, peas, corn)

  • 1 onion, chopped

  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 1 cup shredded cheese (cheddar or your choice)
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
  2. Add onion and garlic, sautÃ© until translucent.
  3. Stir in mixed vegetables and cook for 5 minutes.
  4. Pour in vegetable broth and bring to a boil.
  5. Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
  6. Stir in heavy cream and cheese, season with salt and pepper, and heat through.

item.title: Creamy Butternut Squash Soup for Cozy Nights
item.description: This creamy butternut squash soup is the ultimate comfort food for chilly evenings. Its velvety texture and rich flavor make it a standout dish. Try it tonight and warm your soul!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 medium butternut squash, peeled and cubed
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • 1 cup coconut milk
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
  2. Add onion and garlic, sautÃ© until translucent.
  3. Stir in the cubed butternut squash and cook for 5 minutes.
  4. Pour in the vegetable broth and bring to a boil.
  5. Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes until squash is tender.
  6. Blend the soup until smooth, then stir in coconut milk, nutmeg, salt, and pepper.
